rs-slide.data-title: Updated Message from Superintendent Doerr </br> April 14, 2020

img.title: Layer 2
img.rs-layer: Updated Message from Superintendent Doerr April 14, 2020

rs-layer.br:
Read the updated letter from our superintendent here: Read Letter
East Jackson launches our Continuity of Learning Plan starting the week of April 13: Read East Jackson COL Plan

img.title: libary-featured-box-eastjackson
img.rs-layer:
Read the FAQs involving COVID-19 and remote learning.
Read FAQs

img.title: East Jackson Schools Classroom
img.rs-layer: We understand that Prom, Graduation, and Project Safe are milestones that our seniors look forward to. These special events will be rescheduled for you and your families once we have more details in the upcoming weeks. Please know we are thinking of you and will be celebrating your accomplishments.

rs-slide.data-title: Kindergarten Round Up Dates To Be Determined

img.title: Layer 2
img.rs-layer: Kindergarten Round Up Dates To Be Determined

Please contact Principal, Becky Hager if you have an incoming kindergartner for the 2020-21 school year.
becky.hager@eastjacksonschools.org
She will be collecting basic information only.

img.title: East Jackson Hero
img.rs-layer: Register your student for the 2020-2021 school year by clicking here.

h2.a: TR MS Away Man at VCL

article.class: post-7 page type-page status-publish hentry no-post-thumbnail

div.p: The East Jackson Community Schools is a positive productive and successful learning community for all students.
The East Jackson Community Schools is a positive productive and successful learning community for all students.

h2.span: We are a positive learning community.
We are focused on growth and achievement.
We are committed to best practice and excellence for every classroom and facility.
